long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily curate a wish list with the Tournicote extension.

Explore any website, and when something catches your eye, just one click on our toolbar icon lets you add it to your list.

The real charm of Tournicote? Your browsing experience stays smooth and uninterrupted. No need to navigate to our site to add items.

With Tournicote, crafting gift lists, baby registries, birthday wish lists, grocery lists, and more is a breeze. Your list, a true reflection of your desires, is just a click away!
